member.name: NSTCFOLDERCAPABILITIES
member.summary: Specifies the state of a tree item. These values are used by methods of the interface.

member.name: NSTCFOLDERCAPABILITIES.NSTCFC_NONE
member.summary: The property does not exist. Filtering is not supported.

member.name: NSTCFOLDERCAPABILITIES.NSTCFC_PINNEDITEMFILTERING
member.summary: Property exists. Supports filtering based on the value specified in System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree.

member.name: NSTCFOLDERCAPABILITIES.NSTCFC_DELAY_REGISTER_NOTIFY
member.summary: Delays registration for change notifications until the tree is expanded in the navigation pane.
